ygData.subject: Re: Fed up with EQ - any ideas??
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/26/99 12:05:51 PM Eastern Daylight Time, kaleusi@hotmail.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/26/99 12:05:51 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
kaleusi@... writes:

<<
I'm rather fed up with Verant! They're constantly nerfing everything ingame
that's worth while, or ignoring classes that need to be balanced or
upgraded! So in retrospect, I'm looking to find greener pastures elsewhere.
Perhaps someone out there knows of another game (other than AC and UO) or
perhaps a group who's programming their own game similar to EQ? If so,
please don't hesistate to drop me a line or two via email. Tks in advance!
>>

I have finally found a game that is good enough to pull me away from EQ. It
is called Homeworld. Homeworld not anything like EQ or even a RPing game.
What it is however, is the most immersive, well scripted, graphically
astounding and gameplay addictive game that I have found since EQ came out.
It's hard to describe in words what this game is like, I suggest everyone
download the demo and try it fer yourself. The demo had me hooked after just
the tutorial and I rushed out to get the game immediately.

Wizaro Wrathcaster
29th Wizard - Solusek Ro
